testimonials.text: Venu was a lead developer for a high-profile, fast-tracked IT project that involved business segments beyond our team. Venu made himself available around the clock to troubleshoot and collaborate with onshore and offshore development teams. Venu is highly capable and extremely engaging within a cross-funtional team structure; waterfall and pseudo-Agile run experience. His skillset and expertise helped me get a project from red to green and successfully released on time and budget. I highly recommend Venu!

Venu is an excellent Front End Engineer. We worked together at Wells Fargo in the same team for two years. He is extremely methodical and thorough.His grasp of various front end technologies allows him to explore a plethora of possible solutions to any given problem. His innate ability to learn and adapt to new things quickly makes him a sought-after team member !
